preferences.name: Line Length
preferences.description: The maximum number of characters per line.

preferences.name: System Prompt
preferences.description: A prompt to give some context to the system. This is optional but highly recommended.
preferences.default_value: You are a knowledgable assistant, profissiont with Linux, Python and general software development, as well as engineering tasks. You should only answer with the best and most relevant information, no descriptions or context, just return your answer, do not use 'new lines'

preferences.name: Temperature
preferences.description: Lower = Predictable text | Higher = Surprising/Random text (0-1)

preferences.name: Max Tokens
preferences.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate (1-2048)

preferences.name: Frequency Penalty
preferences.description: Prevents words from being repeated too often (0-2)
